                                  java.lang.String pages)
                           throws java.lang.Exception

Parameters:

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

createAnchor

public static com.lowagie.text.Chunk createAnchor(java.lang.String destination,
                                                  com.lowagie.text.Font font)
Returns a Chunk that is an anchor destination for the given label. The Chunk will be empty (have no text), so it can be placed anywhere. The font size can make a difference in the PDF reader's behavior when jumped to -- usually it will make sure to make the entire line height visible.

createAnchor

public static com.lowagie.text.Chunk createAnchor(java.lang.String destination)
Creates a local destination chunk.

Parameters:
destination - The name of the local destination.
Returns:
The chunk that can be inserted as an anchor.

getReturnType

public static com.lowagie.text.Phrase getReturnType(com.sun.javadoc.MethodDoc methodDoc,
                                                    int fontSize)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
Returns a Chunk containing the return type of a method in text String form. The text is either a primitive data type (such as "int", "float") or the class type. In case of a class, the name is fully qualified for "external" classes (outside the given API package) or short for classes that belong to the same API.

Parameters:
methodDoc - The method of which the returntype should be determined.
Returns:
A Chunk with a text string.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

hasTablesOrLists

public static boolean hasTablesOrLists(com.lowagie.text.Element[] objs)
Checks if the given list of objects contains any PdfPTable, TableParagraph or List objects.

Parameters:
objs - The list of objects to check.
Returns:
True if there is any one of these element types in the list.

Parameters:
